title: cittam alaiyAmal
sahitya:
cittam alaiyAmal dhyAna niddirai koLvAi cinmayat-toTTililE jIva shishuvE


anupallavi

  shuddhOhat-tenralE sukhamAga tAlATTa shOka mOha dAhattin vEgamellAm aDangi


caraNam    pulangaLum karaNamum buddhiyilE aDangi buddhi idayam aDangi 
calanamillA idayam sAkSiyilE aDangittAnE tAn AghiDavE
